name: Glow Puzzle Free
description:
Looking for a puzzle game that is not too difficult? Glow Puzzle is a simple puzzle game to help pass time and it's suitable for everyone. The goal is to connect all of the lines given in each puzzle with a continuous line while using the dots as the bridge to connect them.

• Over 6 million copies downloaded!
• Featured by Apple in What's Hot, Staff Favorites and New & Noteworthy
• Top Free Puzzle Game in US, UK, Canada, Australia and 14 other countries
• As seen on iPhone Life magazine

"Perfect time-waster for the train ride home." - Mac|Life

"Fun and easy to like; definitely worth the download." - App Advice

"perfect blend of simplicity, challenge, and appealing visuals" - AppDiscover

"A fun app that will captivate you for hours on end." - AppPicker

Features:
• Over 950 brain teasing puzzles (30 free levels)
• Solution for each puzzle level
• Two game control (dots selection or lines dragging)
• iCloud progress sync
• Game Center achievements
• Universal app (Optimized for iPhone, iPad & iPod touch)
• Optimized for iOS 7

Developed and published by Nexx Studio. In collaboration with Glosculptor.

Follow Glow Puzzle on Facebook and Twitter for the latest updates and news:
Facebook: facebook.com/GlowPuzzle
Twitter: @GlowPuzzleGame

** Disclaimer: This version is maintained for users who bought in-app level packs in the past. New players should download the full version Glow Puzzle instead. **
